title: Interpretation of a dream about makeup on the face in a dream and its most important interpretations by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about makeup on the face and its most important interpretations by Ibn Sirin. It is known that makeup and cosmetics are used to give a woman an aesthetic personality in addition to reducing facial defects such as the effects of pimples, melasma, wrinkles, etc. The priest, and during our article we will explain the most important interpretations that have appeared for seeing makeup on the face in a dream. Interpretation of a dream of makeup on the faceThere are many interpretations and explanations that have appeared regarding seeing a person in a dream of makeup on the face, as these interpretations came in multiple aspects according to the condition of the viewer when applying makeup and the details of the vision in the dream, as the vision is generally about the girl in her desire to change her circumstances for the better. Interpretation of a dream of makeup on the faceRead also: Interpretation of a dream of nuts for unmarried women, pregnant women and menInterpretation of seeing makeup in a dreamSeeing makeup in general in the dreamer's dream is a correction of the viewer's conditions or circumstances in his life, in addition to improving his fate and biography in front of people from his reality. The vision of a woman is considered to take care of herself and correct her flaws in her life. The vision indicates covering up the insight for what distinguishes it from flaws and shortcomings. Seeing her wearing very beautiful makeup indicates positive changes in the dreamer's life. Seeing the situation in the house indicates the joy and happiness that the dreamer will hear in her coming days. Seeing the gravity placed on the eye indicates the insight's comfort from anxiety and the insight that he enjoys. Also, seeing a person Another wearing eyeliner means good news that the dreamer will hear in his life. Seeing eyebrow decorations indicates the fortune teller's reputation. Putting on mascara in a dream is a warning to the dreamer to be careful and cautious of those around him. As for putting on lipstick in a dream, it is an indication of the kind and beautiful words that the dreamer says to those around her. Putting on makeup in an inappropriate manner indicates the inappropriate style of a woman in her life. In addition to seeing the appropriate application of makeup, it indicates the elegant style that the dreamer enjoys when dealing with those around her. Read also: Interpretation of a dream about the Pharaonic cemetery for single women, married women, pregnant women and men and its most important indications for Ibn Sirin Interpretation of a dream about putting on makeup for single women There are many interpretations mentioned by translators and scholars in the science of dream interpretation about seeing makeup in a dream, especially for a single girl, as many interpretations of this vision have appeared and in multiple aspects depending on the difference in vision from person to person. Another and different in the details as well: The vision symbolizes the joy and happiness that the girl will experience in the coming period. The vision also indicates the girl’s marriage or engagement in the coming days. The vision also indicates the compliments and praise that the seer receives from those around her, and the punishment of their home. Seeing shapeless makeup symbolizes the failure of the seer in the affairs of her life, in addition to her lack of interaction with others around her. title: Interpretation and interpretation of a dream about driving a car in the back seat for a single woman

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about driving a car in the back seat for a single woman. There are many interpretations related to a dream about driving a car, as it generally indicates a change in circumstances and the transition to a new stage in life. To the dreamer, and interpretation scholars have developed a set of these interpretations that differed according to the social status of the dreamer, in addition to the circumstances that the dreamer is going through, and in our article we will learn about the interpretation of a dream about driving a car in the individual back seat. Interpretation of a dream about driving a car in the back seat in a dream in general Seeing yourself riding in a car in the back seat is considered a good dream, because it brings good news and has clues and suggestions that change circumstances in the dreamer’s life. Among these interpretations are the following: This suggests the interpretation that the dreamer follows the example of a person who drives a car in general and gets his opinion on matters in his life. It is also necessary for the back seat of the car to be intact for this dream to become a good dream or indicate good news. Bad news for the viewer. But if one sees in his dream that he is sitting in the back seat of a car and the person driving the car in the dream is a scary person, this may indicate that the dreamer gets the opinion of a corrupt and corrupt person. In his life, and that this person will hurt him at some point. And God knows the unseen. See also: Interpretation of dreams about driving a car in the back seat for Nabulul Interpretation of a vision of driving a car in the back seat for a single woman A single woman has many different dreams and visions, and we notice the vision of driving a car in the back seat in her dream. If the dreamer sees in her dream that she is sitting in the seat In the back and she felt sad and her father was the one driving the car, this may indicate that the single woman feels restricted because of her father and brother’s control over her, and their interference. In all matters of her life. If an unmarried girl dreams that she is sitting in the back seat and that her fiancé is the one driving the car, this may also indicate that she will live with him a life full of happiness and joy. Especially if her fiancé is driving the car in standby mode. God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about driving a car for a pregnant woman in a dream. Of course, the interpretation of dreams is related to the period of her pregnancy and the fetus in her womb, as during this period many hormonal and life changes occur in various aspects of her life and we offer you some interpretations such as: If a pregnant woman saw in her dream that she was sitting in If she is in the back seat of the car and feels comfortable and that her husband is the one driving the car, this may mean that she will receive care, support and care during pregnancy. stage, and that her husband will provide her with security and peace until she gives birth to her fetus. However, if the dreamer sees that she is sitting in the back seat and does not feel comfortable, this may indicate the difficulty of her giving birth and the feeling of pain in her body throughout the pregnancy. In addition, if a pregnant woman sees in a dream that she was Sitting in the back seat of the car and her mother was sitting next to her and smiled and congratulated her, it may mean that the

title: Seeing sheep in a dream for a man

preview.html: Seeing sheep in a dream for a manThe interpretation of seeing a sheep in a dream for a man has many different interpretations and we will explain them as follows: It is a sign of kindness and good news for the individual for many positive changes in his future life. When a man sees a sheep in a dream, this is good news that he will get money and things. The good that will come to him soon. And if a man sees a sheep in a dream and he was working in reality, this is an indication that he succeeded in his work and was promoted because he achieved many achievements in a short period of time. This vision could be an indication that he will find another new job and earn a lot of money from it. Money. But if the man is still studying and seeking knowledge in his studies, then he saw the sheep in his dream. This is good news for his ability to overcome all obstacles in his studies and excel. And increase his depth in knowledge and achieve his goals in education and success in it. And in the case that the man sees a sheep in his dream But he felt close to and disgusted by her. This is an indication of his frequent hesitation and inability to make decisions on his own. His family makes his own decisions for him, which is a sign of his lack of self-esteem and low self-confidence. Seeing sheep in a dream is a sign of a man’s stubbornness and reckless behavior. The matter Which leads to the problems and worries that dominate his life at that time, and will increase if he does not stop his stubbornness and recklessness. In addition to the meaning of the sheep in the dream for the man who has good skin in general, and the achievements and profits that will accrue to him if they are material. Or in his life morally in The near future. Seeing sheep in general indicates the coming of courage, happiness, and goodness for a person in the future, God willing. If a person has a debt and a sheep in a dream, this indicates that these debts have been paid, and it is good news about the abundance of livelihood that will come to him. Read Also: Interpretation of seeing a sheep in a dream for a married woman. Seeing a black sheep in a dream. The matter may differ here in the interpretation of seeing a sheep in a dream for a man if it is black in color, and we will explain the interpretation as follows: If a person sees a black sheep in his dream, this is a sign that he will get a big promotion. In his job and after obtaining it, everyone will respect him and appreciate him with due appreciation. Seeing a black sheep in a man’s dream shows a good and humane sign that he will obtain a lot of money in the near future. After obtaining it, he will implement all the plans and decisions that he had previously postponed. Interpretation of seeing the sheep White in a dream for a man: The interpretation of the dream varies if one sees a white sheep in his dream and it is interpreted as follows: Seeing a white sheep in a dream for a man indicates his diligence and efforts to expand his family’s livelihood. He will obtain a lot of money, which will increase his livelihood and he will be able to meet all of his family’s demands. With all ease and comfort. In reference to the fact that he sees a white sheep in a dream for a man, his good news is that he will obtain all goodness and wishes as a result. Because he is close to his Lord, he abstains from sins and immorality and what God has forbidden, and he

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing the Qur’an memorized in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about memorizing the Qur’an in a dream by Ibn Sirin: If a person dreams in a dream that he is memorizing the Qur’an for a sleeping person, this means that the dreamer’s worries will go away and indicates good deeds. Also, seeing memorizing the Qur’an in a dream may express happiness and pleasure in the dreamer’s life and also indicates his close marriage. From a good girl. Also, seeing an unmarried girl memorizing the Qur’an indicates the excellence and success she has achieved in her life and the high position in which she shines. Seeing a house for memorizing the Qur’an in an unmarried woman’s dream. Interpretation of seeing a house for memorizing the Qur’an in a dream for an unmarried woman, and entering it indicates that she will satisfy her desires. Many things in her life. Also, the dream of a girl entering a house for recitation of the Qur’an is considered evidence that God will grant her a good and successful marriage. Seeing memorizing the Qur’an in a dream for an unmarried woman indicates good morals and a good spirit and indicates her closeness to God Almighty. Seeing a house for memorizing the Qur’an in a dream for a woman Married Woman: A married woman entering a house to memorize the Qur’an for her husband or children in a dream is one of the visions that show the husband’s high status. Also, seeing children memorizing the Qur’an in a dream is good news and happiness that this woman and her family will enjoy. Interpretation of seeing a Qur’an teacher in a dreamInterpretation of seeing a Qur’an teacher The generous in the dream of an unmarried girl, and this indicates the girl’s marriage to a good man who is obedient to God Almighty. If someone dreams in a dream that the teacher is memorizing the Qur’an for his children, this indicates the end of his worries and disagreements that will be removed. Also, seeing a Qur’an teacher in a dream indicates closeness to God Almighty, belief in God, adherence to religion, and memorization of the Qur’an. Interpretation of a dream of memorizing the Qur’an in a pregnant woman’s dream. The vision of memorizing the Qur’an for a pregnant woman indicates the end of her worries and the ease of giving birth to a child healthy from all diseases. If a pregnant woman dreams that she is memorizing the Qur’an for her husband, this means that her worries will go away, and he will calm down. Its affairs, and God knows best. Interpretation of attending a Qur’an memorization class in a dream. Whoever sees in his dream a house where the Qur’an is memorized indicates good charitable works and spending money on works, and God knows best. Also, seeing a house where the Qur’an is memorized in a dream indicates the collapse of one’s worries, one’s undertaking new jobs, and marriage. And joys to come. Seeing a house for memorizing the Qur’an in a dream indicates achieving goals and providing abundant and lawful money. It also indicates self-development that will change. For a married man to see in his dream that he is arguing with one of the women from the house for memorizing the Qur’an, this indicates his betrayal of his wife, and God knows best. Seeing a school for memorizing the Qur’an in a dream. The interpretation of a dream about entering a school for memorizing the Qur’an is evidence of the goodness and happiness that the dreamer will achieve in his life. Whoever sees people of the Qur’an in his dream, this indicates repentance to God, and it also shows that he memorized the entire Holy Qur’an until he completed it, and God knows best. An unmarried girl to the People of the Qur’an in a dream indicates excellence in her academic and professional life and the development of her life for the better. Seeing the People of the Qur’an in a dream indicates a man.

title: Interpretation of a dream about fear in a dream and the consequences of seeing fear in a dream

preview.html: Learn about the interpretation of a dream about fear in a dream, through the site In a Dream, see the opinion of Ibn Sirin and dream interpreters about seeing fear in a dream and the interpretation of fear and fleeing in a dream, whether fear of a person or something.Interpretation of a dream about fearFear in a dream in general interpretations indicates anxiety and tension regarding an issue Certain and reflects the psychological state of the dreamer. The interpretation of fear in a dream can indicate the dreamer’s fear of the future and can indicate disappointment and despair. Seeing fear in a dream can be interpreted in some visions as repentance and can indicate victory over the enemy. It is said that waiting for fear In a dream, it is a sign of battle, and fear can symbolize taking a stand. Fear may indicate the dreamer’s feeling of insecurity or instability in his life. See also: Seeing jeans in a dream. Kidnapping in a dream. Fear in a dream. The interpretation of fear in a dream accompanied by crying indicates the joy and happiness that The dreamer will receive it. The fear of crying also indicates the fulfillment of long-awaited desires. Seeing fear and crying in countries where there are wars is a sign of peace for them. Seeing fear for a married woman is evidence of her constancy and love for her husband, especially if in a dream she is afraid of her husband Interpretation of a dream about fear for someone. Fear of someone in a dream indicates the viewer’s inability to make decisions, or it may indicate his inability to succeed and achieve his dream. title: Learn more about the interpretation of seeing chocolate in a dream and its meaning

preview.html: What you do not know about seeing chocolate in a dream and its interpretationChocolate in a dream has many different interpretations, but for the most part it looks good and its interpretation is good, except for many places where its interpretation is not good and the interpretation varies from one person to another.Interpretation of chocolate in a dreamSeeing chocolate in a dream Whether white or black, it indicates kindness, happiness, and ease of dealing. It also symbolizes the end of sadness and anguish, and new friendships will be made. Whoever dreams of giving and distributing chocolate, this indicates appreciation and love. Dreaming of chocolate being black means changing the situation for the better, removing anxiety, and comfort from God. After hardships. Whoever sees himself eating chocolate in a dream means that God will facilitate his affairs and grant him success. Interpretation of a dream about eating chocolate. If a person sees himself eating chocolate in his sleep, this indicates that God will facilitate the affairs of his life and his prosperity. Seeing an unmarried girl in a dream eating delicious-tasting chocolate means engagement and marriage, God willing.. Chocolate symbolizes in the dream, whether it is white or Black. If an unmarried girl dreams that someone is giving her chocolate, this means that she will marry this person. Chocolate in a dream Chocolate in a dream mostly indicates happiness and goodness, specifically in a married woman’s dream, it means food and pleasure, and if a married woman sees that her husband gave her A piece of chocolate in a dream, it means that she will become pregnant. A new home. If a married woman dreams that she is eating a lot of chocolate in a dream, this indicates money, and if a married woman dreams that someone gives her chocolate, then the dream indicates that she will receive good news. It was filled with milk, coffee, or dates, which indicates that her due date is approaching. Google the Egyptian dream interpretation website and you will find all the dream interpretations you are looking for. Interpretation of a dream about eating dark chocolate. Dark chocolate in a dream indicates happy news and symbolizes beautiful feelings and love. Dark chocolate in a dream indicates strong feelings and love, and chocolate in a pregnant woman’s dream determines the sex of her fetus, so if she sees someone giving her white chocolate, this indicates that she will give birth to a female, and if she sees someone giving her. Her dark chocolate, this indicates that she will give birth to a boy. title: Learn about the interpretation of a dream about diarrhea according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about diarrhea: Diarrhea is one of the diseases that afflict people as a result of something bad in the stomach and it portends many unpleasant things, and because it is one of the undesirable things in reality, dreaming about it also carries a lot of evidence for the dreamer that it may foretell warning them of something wrong, so let’s read The article is below so that we know some of these interpretations. Interpretation of a dream about diarrhea: If the dreamer sees in a dream that he is suffering from diarrhea, this is a sign that he is spending his money very lavishly, and if he does not stop these actions, this will lead him to a serious financial crisis, and he will not find anyone to stand by him. He will run away because those around him do not They take it seriously. In his dream, he sees himself suffering from severe diarrhea and he cannot control it. This is a sign that he is obtaining his money from illegal sources and this will expose him to a lot of trouble if his case is revealed. Whoever dreams during his sleep that he has diarrhea and its smell is strong, this means that he is not alone. In his relationship with others, he does not give them their full rights, and this makes him commit a great sin and he will suffer from it. Diarrhea, but without unpleasant odors, this is an indication that he has found the medicine that God (the Most High) will heal him. Interpretation of a dream about diarrhea by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin interprets a person’s dream of diarrhea in a dream as a sign that he got rid of the obstacles that stood in his way while achieving his goals and was able to achieve A dazzling success, and the dreamer seeing foul-smelling diarrhea during his sleep. It indicates that he eats his daily food in a way that does not please God Almighty, and although he is aware of the consequences, he does not care, and this will magnify the punishment that he will receive as a reward for these actions. If the dreamer sees in his dream that he has diarrhea in front of people and cannot control himself, then this Evidence of the discovery of a mistake committed in secret. It is a sign that he will suffer from a very serious illness that will keep him bedridden for a long time. The Asrar website for the interpretation of dreams is a site specializing in the interpretation of dreams in the Arab world, just write. A site about the secrets of dream interpretation. Search on Google and get the correct interpretations. Interpretation of a dream about diarrhea for a single woman. The dream of an unmarried woman Diarrhea in a dream indicates that she is committing many sins and immoralities without paying attention to the dire consequences that will result from them, and this will lead her to great destruction in this world and the hereafter, if she does not reconsider. By herself and stopping these actions, and if the dreamer saw it during her sleep, this indicates that she was suffering from diarrhea, but she felt great relief once it went away, and this is a sign that she will get rid of many of the things that cause her great distress in her life. In the event that the dreamer sees that there is no Her ability to control diarrhea in his dream means that she is very reckless and does not take anything seriously, and this will make her unable to manage her affairs and suffer a lot. Her life is a result of that. Interpretation of a dream about yellow diarrhea for a single woman. An unmarried woman who dreams of yellow diarrhea in a dream indicates that she is surrounded by many hypocrites.

title: Seeing Yathum in a dream and the reasons why Yathum dreams about it

preview.html: Seeing Jatom in a dream is a terrifying vision that causes anxiety and tension in the viewer. Therefore, many people wonder about its interpretation, and in the lines of this article we will point out the various interpretations related to seeing a dead body in a dream and seeing it in a dream for single women, married women, pregnant women, men, etc. Continue until we follow us. What is jathoom? jathoom is the sleep paralysis that the fortuneteller feels and prevents him from moving and speaking and also makes him unable to breathe. He also feels something seriously attacking him and tries to overcome it, and this can happen in the same person many times. A frightening and frightening thing for every human being. A jathoom in a dream. There are scientific reasons for seeing a jathoom and there are religious reasons and we will show you all the reasons. A jathoom can occur due to a lot of stress and anxiety or depression and psychological pressure. It can occur due to taking some medications or perhaps sleeping and lying on your back. It is Religious reasons: Sleeping on impurity, or lack of vaccination, and perhaps being negligent in worship. Seeing a corpse in a dream Seeing a married woman in a dream being attacked may indicate her tendency to isolate herself and keep her away from people and their hatred and harm. To see a corpse in a dream or a corpse in a dream for a woman For a married woman, it means disagreements with her husband and that her married life is unstable. Seeing jathoom in a dream for a married woman is also a sign that she is unable to bear responsibilities and is always afraid of them. Seeing jathoom in a dream for a married woman symbolizes that she bears many of the pressures and tensions of life. All the time for this reason. Seeing a corpse or a corpse in a dream for a pregnant woman indicates her anxiety and fear of childbirth. Seeing humiliation in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates the problems and fears that she always feels. Seeing a man in a dream is a sign of a lot of lies and hypocrisy around him. Seeing a corpse Or jahamah in a man’s dream may indicate that he is going through a difficult financial situation. Seeing a young man in a dream may be a sign of his failure to perform acts of worship. Seeing a veil in a young man’s dream indicates his desire for something, but he is unable to achieve it. Also, seeing jahamah in dreams A divorced woman also refers to those close to her who hate her for good and want to harm her. The interpretation of a divorced woman’s dream is a symbol of her desire to take revenge on her ex-husband to obtain her rights. See also: A supplication for disturbing dreams and nightmares. Symptoms of touching during sleep. Interpretation of a dream about crouching by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream about crouching while reciting the Qur’an in a dream indicates a solution. Crises and problems that fill the life of the dreamer and overcoming difficulties. Interpretation of a dream about Jathoom In the dream, it symbolizes the person who is chasing the dreamer and trying to harm him. Seeing a veil in a dream means that the dreamer is committing many sins and disobedience. Interpretation of a dream about Jathoom attacking in a dream and feeling paralyzed and heavy throughout his body Seeing humiliation in a dream for an unmarried woman could be a sign of her fear of a specific thing.

title: What is the interpretation of a dream that I got married while I was single according to Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: What is the interpretation of the dream in which I got married while I was single in a dream according to Ibn Sirin that the dream of marriage is one of the most common dreams that people can see in their dreams, whether they are married or unmarried, and it is also repeated to a large extent, as it carries a set of important associations and interpretations, As it may carry the meaning of marriage or childbirth, the interpretation of this dream varies according to the state of the dreamer and whether this dreamer is single or married, and to learn about the interpretation of a dream that I got married while I am single in a dream according to Ibn Sirin, follow the article with us. Interpretation of dreams that I got married while I am single, the lawyers say in The interpretation of this dream is that it indicates an upcoming marriage if the person you married is known, and it may indicate the fulfillment of a dream or desire desired by an unmarried girl. This can indicate blessings in life and increased sustenance, and if she is a seeker of knowledge, it can indicate success and excellence, and marrying a stranger with sadness and dissatisfaction can indicate canceling the engagement and dealing with problems and fears in life. And if an unmarried woman sees in her dream that she If she marries a well-known man, it may mean that she will achieve what she seeks. Her life, and if she sees that she is marrying a close man, this may indicate that she will hear happy news. If she sees an unpleasant marriage, this may indicate getting rid of worry and worry. Interpretation of dreams that I got married and got married to Ibn Shaheen. The scholar Ibn Shaheen says: If a woman sees If a married woman dreams that she got married, this is different from the dream in which she got married while I was single. This indicates that she will get pregnant soon and may show happiness and joy in life in general, or that she will soon hear happy news, and seeing the wedding of someone she was in a relationship with or engaged to may indicate that she is still alive. Thinking about it or it may indicate psychological exhaustion or the existence of problems between her and her husband. Interpretation of the dream of marriage in a dream about a pregnant woman by Imam Al-Asimi After we learned about the interpretation of the dream that I got married and I was single in the dream, we will learn about the interpretation of the dream of marriage in a dream about a pregnant woman, as he says Imam Al-Usaimi Seeing a wedding party in a dream about a pregnant woman and wearing a wedding dress again can indicate an imminent birth, and it is evidence of the birth that will be easy, God willing. Interpretation of dreams that I got married when I was a single young man. In the interpretation of this dream, jurists say that the marriage of a married woman to a young man Evidence that a man is seeking something that is difficult to obtain and impossible to obtain, and marrying an unknown or dead girl may indicate goals of achievement. That was impossible, and seeing marriage to a girl with a good reputation and beautiful appearance may indicate that the young man will soon marry a girl with the same specifications and the same amount of beauty that he saw in the dream. Interpretation of the dream of marriage by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin says in the interpretation of the dream that I got married while I was single, or that The dream of marriage has many different interpretations, and each interpretation varies according to the dreamer’s condition, as follows: The marriage of an unmarried woman indicates that

title: Interpretation of a dream about waking up in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about waking up from sleep: Dreaming about falling asleep in a dream is a strange thing, and dreaming about waking up from it is less strange, yet it has more than one interpretation. Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi explained it, and each of them had his own interpretation. Some said that it was asceticism, and others said that it was caution against negligence, and God knows best. In this article, we will provide more interpretation. Interpretation of seeing sleep in a dream by Ibn Sirin. If the dreamer sees in a dream that he is sleeping on his back, this indicates However, his luck is good, and he has the ability to control all his affairs, because the ground on which he stands is solid. But if he sees that he is sleeping on his stomach, this indicates a loss of prestige, a loss of money, and it also shows weakness. Ibn Sirin explained that sleeping on his stomach means Also, the fortuneteller at that time is oblivious, so he does not keep up with what is happening around him, and he cannot act on the matters that happen within him, and he cannot achieve this. What is required of him is that God Almighty is Most High and Most Knowing. As Ibn Sirin explained, sleeping on a bed indicates comfort and tranquility after fatigue and suffering, and he will gain honor and prestige that pleases him. If he sees in a dream that he is sleeping on a bed other than his own, this means that the dreamer’s condition will change. From one condition to another and from worse to better and vice versa, this depends on the condition of the bed in which he sleeps. on me. In his vision. If an unmarried girl sees herself sleeping in bed, this indicates that she will get married in the coming period, and God knows best. And whoever sees in a dream that he is sleeping on his back, and a piece of bread comes out of his mouth, this indicates the fortuneteller’s inability to control his affairs, and he will be exposed for days. Difficult, even his money is relieved by others. Interpretation of seeing sleep in a dream by Sheikh Al-Nabulsi Sheikh Al-Nabulsi will interpret seeing a dream of sleep as unemployment and lack of success at work. He also said that if the dreamer is suffering from some problems in his life and then sleeps and sees in the dream that he is sleeping, this indicates Relief from his distress by God’s command. Interpretation of seeing himself waking up from sleep in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin interpreted seeing himself waking up from his sleep in a dream as a sign of improvement in the fortuneteller’s circumstances and luck on his way. He added that whoever sees himself in control of sleep will be defeated in wakefulness. He interpreted waking up from Sleeping in a dream in any of his conditions, because he will do so, whether it is good or bad for him. The dreamer’s inability to wake up from sleep in a dream indicates a lack of return to God, and steadfastness in sin and error. As for the one who sees that he is able to do From his bed, this indicates the loss of grace from him, and his illness. As for the vision of waking up from sleep and returning to sleep, it indicates repentance, returning to God, and returning to sin again. This, and God knows best. Al-Nabulsi’s interpretation of seeing waking up from sleep in a dream. Al-Nabulsi’s interpretation of seeing waking up from sleep in a dream is evidence of the dreamer’s long life, the completion of his deeds, and their completion. He says: Whoever sees that he is waking up another person in a dream, this indicates that he is leading him on the right path. He added, in the interpretation of dreams, that seeing yourself waking up from a dream indicates awakening
